body: A Bridge allows your Road hexes to cross rivers.
name: Bridge*
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Terrain Improvements/Bridge*

sections.body: When you build a Road in a hex that contains a river, the doubled coast of the Road includes the cost of bridges needed to cross the river. You don't need to build a Bridge as a separate unit; it's listed here for reference only.
sections.name: Cost
